ik im.
JOHN 9.10 þanuh qeþun du imma:
ƕaiwa usluknodedun þus þo augona?
JOHN 9.11 andhof jains jah qaþ:
manna haitans Iesus fani gawaurhta jah bismait mis augona jah qaþ mis:
gagg afþwahan in þata swumfsl Siloamis;
iþ ik galaiþ jah biþwahands ussaƕ.
JOHN 9.12 qeþun þan du imma:
ƕar ist sa?
iþ is qaþ:
ni wait.
JOHN 9.13 gatiuhand ina du Fareisaium, þana saei was blinds.
JOHN 9.14 wasuh þan sabbato, þan þata fani gawaurhta Iesus jah uslauk imma augona.
JOHN 9.15 aftra þan frehun ina jah þai Fareisaieis ƕaiwa ussaƕ;
iþ is qaþ jah þaim:
fani galagida mis ana augona jah afþwoh, jah saiƕa.
JOHN 9.16 qeþun þan sumai þize Fareisaie:
sa manna nist fram guda, þande sabbate daga ni witaiþ.
sumaih qeþun:
ƕaiwa mag manna frawaurhts swaleikos taiknins taujan?
jah missaqiss warþ miþ im.
JOHN 9.17 qeþunuh du þamma faurþis blindin aftra:
þu ƕa qiþis bi þana ei uslauk þus augona?
iþ is qaþuh:
þatei praufetus ist.
JOHN 9.18 ni galaubidedun þan Iudaieis bi ina þatei is blinds wesi jah usseƕi, unte atwopidedun þans fadrein is, þis ussaiƕandins.
JOHN 9.19 jah frehun ins qiþandans:
sau ist sa sunus izwar þanei jus qiþiþ þatei blinds gabaurans waurþi?
ƕaiwa nu saiƕiþ?
JOHN 9.20 andhofun þan im þai fadrein is jah qeþun:
witum þatei sa ist sunus unsar, jah þatei blinds gabaurans warþ;
JOHN 9.21 iþ ƕaiwa nu saiƕiþ ni witum, aiþþau ƕas uslauk imma þo augona weis ni witum;
silba uswahsans ist,
ina fraihniþ,
silba bi sik rodjai.
JOHN 9.22 þata qeþun þai fadrein is, unte ohtedun sis Iudaiuns;
juþan auk gaqeþun sis Iudaieis, ei, jabai ƕas ina andhaihaiti Xristu, utana swnagogais wairþai.
JOHN 9.23 duhþe þai berusjos is qeþun þatei
uswahsans ist,
silban fraihniþ.
JOHN 9.24 atwopidedun þan anþaramma sinþa þana mannan saei was blinds, jah qeþun du imma:
gif hauhein guda!
weis witum þatei sa manna frawaurhts ist.
JOHN 9.25 þanuh andhof jains:
jabai frawaurhts ist, ik ni wait;
þatain wait ei blinds was, iþ nu saiƕa.
JOHN 9.26 þanuh qeþun du imma aftra:
ƕa gatawida þus?
ƕaiwa uslauk þus augona?
JOHN 9.27 andhof im:
qaþ izwis ju jah ni hausideduþ;
ƕa aftra wileiþ hausjan?
ibai jah jus wileiþ þamma siponjos wairþan?
JOHN 9.28 þanuh lailoun imma jah qeþun:
þu is siponeis þamma, iþ weis Mose siponjos sijum.
JOHN 9.29 weis witum þatei du Mose rodida guþ, iþ þana ni kunnum, ƕaþro ist.
JOHN 9.30 andhof sa manna jah qaþ du im:
auk in þamma sildaleik ist, þatei jus ni wituþ ƕaþro ist, jah uslauk mis augona.
JOHN 9.31 witumuh þan þatei guþ frawaurhtaim ni andhauseiþ, ak jabai ƕas gudblostreis ist jah wiljan is taujiþ, þamma hauseiþ.
JOHN 9.32 fram aiwa ni gahausiþ was þatei uslukiþ ƕas augona blindamma gabauranamma.
JOHN 9.33 nih wesi sa fram guda, ni mahtedi taujan ni waiht.
JOHN 9.34 andhofun jah qeþun du imma:
in frawaurhtim þu gabaurans warst alls jah þu laiseis unsis?
jah uswaurpun imma ut.
JOHN 9.35 hausida Iesus þatei uswaurpun imma ut, jah bigat ina qaþuh du imma:
þu ga-laubeis-u du sunau gudis?
JOHN 9.36 andhof jains jah qaþ:
an ƕas ist, frauja, ei galaubjau du imma?
JOHN 9.37 qaþ þan imma Iesus:
jah gasaƕt ina jah saei rodeiþ miþ þus, sa ist.
JOHN 9.38 iþ is qaþuh:
galaubja, frauja;
jah inwait ina.
JOHN 9.39 jah qaþ Iesus:
du stauai ik in þamma fairƕau qam, ei þai unsaiƕandans saiƕaina jah þai saiƕandans blindai wairþaina.
JOHN 9.40 jah hausidedun þize Fareisaie sumai þata, þai wisandans miþ imma, jah qeþun du imma:
ibai jah weis blindai sijum?
JOHN 9.41 qaþ im Iesus:
iþ blindai weseiþ, ni þau habaidedeiþ frawaurhtais;
iþ nu qiþiþ þatei
gasaiƕam;
eiþan frawaurhts izwara þairhwisiþ.
